DataElement.preferredName: Person Cardiac Valve Problem Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable coded response regarding whether a patient has a difficulty, disorder or condition needing resolution in any of the four valves of the heart.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Any of the four heart valves, including the two atrioventricular valves and the two semilunar valves, that regulate the flow of blood through the chambers of the heart._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any of the four heart valves, including the two atrioventricular valves and the two semilunar valves, that regulate the flow of blood through the chambers of the heart.:Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

Concepts.definition: Any of the four heart valves, including the two atrioventricular valves and the two semilunar valves, which regulate the flow of blood through the chambers of the heart.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have abnormal ca
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have abnormal cardiac valve morphology?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have abnormal cardiac valve morphology (greater than or equal to grade 2) documented by ECHO (subjects with grade 1 abnormalities [i.e., mild regurgitation/stenosis] can be entered on study)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have abnormal cardiac valve morphology (greater than or equal to grade 2) documented by echocardiogram (subjects with grade 1 abnormalities [i.e., mild regurgitation/stenosis] can be entered on study)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have significant valvular disease; severe regurgitation or stenosis by imaging independent of symptom control with medical intervention, or history of valve replacement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have severe valvular heart disease?
